page.title: 18GAMES part2
page.content:
{ BULLDOG} This is a game where all the players are lined up at one end of the play area and one player, A, is positioned facing them, between them and the other side of the play area. A calls someone's name and that person has to try to run past A to the other side. If he succeeds then all the rest of the players try to run past A and any who are caught join A in the middle. The last person to be caught wins.
{ SARDINES }This is similar to Hide and Seek, except that, as each person finds the one hiding,he joins him in the hiding-place.
